revised_title: Invention and Advantages of the Shwan-Pan, a Chinese Account-Table
tldr: The author, Gamaliel Smethurst, introduces a new arithmetical instrument called the Shwan-Pan, or Chinese Account-Table, which he claims is an improvement over the traditional Chinese method. The Shwan-Pan is faster, less prone to mistakes, and can be used by the visually impaired. It can also be helpful in teaching arithmetic to young people and examining accounts.
